description.message: This extension enable the use of emotes from Twitch, BTTV and FFZ at Booyah!

settingsDescription.message: Below are the configurations available at the moment, the emotes are fetch from Twitch, BetterTTV and FrankerFaceZ

homeDescription.message:
This is an extension that allows you to use emotes from Twitch, BetterTTV and FrankerFaceZ at Booyah!
Click at the button below to configure and add channels
